Security First

OAuth only • Least privilege • Revocable access • Logs on request

Your data never leaves your environment. We use industry-standard OAuth flows with minimal permissions. All access is logged and can be revoked instantly. No data mining, no tracking, no surprises.

Frequently Asked Questions

What exactly is included in the free 14-day pilot?
Full access to your custom AI agent for 14 days, including setup, training, and ongoing support. No limitations, no hidden costs.
How long does deployment take?
From audit to live deployment: 48 hours. We work quickly to get you value fast.
What if I'm not satisfied after the pilot?
No questions asked. We'll remove the agent and you owe nothing. Your satisfaction is our priority.
Can I customize the AI agent's behavior?
Absolutely. Each agent is built specifically for your workflow and can be fine-tuned during the pilot period.
What security measures are in place?
OAuth-only access, least privilege permissions, full audit logging, and instant revocation capabilities.
How much does it cost after the pilot?
Pricing is based on usage and value delivered. We'll discuss options during your pilot period.
